name: Modulocean
description:
Play with sound and destroy cities!

Each bubble changes one effect on the sound and different combinations destroy different buildings.

See if you can discover all the characters!

~~

Originally made for #AGBIC jam 2015

Inspiration : http://famicase.com/08/softs/02.html

~~

Now with potato and new songs!

Get it on mobile for Modulocean on the go!
